item.title: Aura – Vol. 01 – Sample Pack
item.dc:creator: Jamil
item.description:
Aura - Vol. 01 is completely focused on melodies for making Versatile Music. From Hip-hop Drum beats to Rock - Aura gives you carefully curated loops to make hit songs. Drum loops in Aura resemble strong drops that you hear in modern Hip-hop tracks. Not only Hip-hop beats, you will also find Pop & Rock drums. Moreover, Aura has guitar loops for you Lo-Fi tracks. Guitar Loops include Rhythms, Plucking & Solo Licks.

Melody styles included:

  • Hip-hop, pop, Rock, Various, World

Licensing rights included with purchase:

  • All melodies are 100% royalty-free
item.content:encoded:
Aura – Vol. 01 is completely focused on melodies for making Versatile Music. From Hip-hop Drum beats to Rock – Aura gives you carefully curated loops to make hit songs.

Drum loops in Aura resemble strong drops that you hear in modern Hip-hop tracks. Not only Hip-hop beats, you will also find Pop & Rock drums. Moreover, Aura has guitar loops for you Lo-Fi tracks.

Guitar Loops include Rhythms, Plucking & Solo Licks.

Melody styles included:

  • Hip-hop, pop, Rock, Various, World

Licensing rights included with purchase:

  • All melodies are 100% royalty-free
